definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: And yet, the writing life continues to capture its victims.
sentences.chinese: 但是，寫作的生活將繼續捕捉愛好它的“落網之魚”。

sentences.english: I made a vow to writing, very young.
sentences.chinese: 我立誓寫作時非常年輕。

sentences.english: This week I have been covering creative writing.
sentences.chinese: 本週我教授創作型寫作。

sentences.english: English writing assessment is an important part of the English process writing.
sentences.chinese: 英語寫作評改是英語過程寫作的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: English writing assessment is an important part of the English process writing.
sentences.chinese: 英語寫作評改是英語過程寫作的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: He had troubles with the very elements of writing.
sentences.chinese: 他在掌握寫作的基本要領方面困難重重。

sentences.english: Eric Blair wrote under the pseudonym of George Orwell.
sentences.chinese: 喬治奧韋爾爲筆名寫作。

sentences.english: But I do it. I write it.
Writing is a renewed passion that I have re-discovered.
sentences.chinese: 寫作是我重新發現的一個重燃的激情。

sentences.english: Of the various forms of discourse narration is perhaps the most familiar to us.
sentences.chinese: 記敘文是我們最爲熟悉的一種寫作文體。

sentences.english: In doing this, more people will be inspired and encouraged to write.
sentences.chinese: 如此拋磚引玉，能激發與鼓勵更多人加入寫作隊伍。

sentences.english: Wring is to express your thought through language.
sentences.chinese: 寫作就是通過語言表達你自己的思想。

sentences.english: I think brainbarfing is a more natural way to come up with writing material.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲絞盡腦汁是一種採集寫作素材更自然的方法。

sentences.english: Students′oversight in the course of topic exploring will lead to the failure of their compositions.
sentences.chinese: 審題時的疏漏會導致作文失敗，寫作成績不理想。

sentences.english: He had all but completed 2666 when he died.
sentences.chinese: 去世前他完成了《2666》的寫作。

sentences.english: Interesting is the letter writing that they had to do.
sentences.chinese: 最有意思的是書信寫作。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
